CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 6, 1952, pg. 22, reads: "Star of 'Antigone' - Judith Dalin has title role in the Curtaineers' forthcoming production of 'Antigone' [illegible] initial offering of the 1952-53 season. The modern adaptation of the old Greek drama will be presented next weekend, Dec. 11, 12 and 13, at the Theresa L. Kaufmann Theatre, 1835 Centre Avenue."
TitMainTitle: Actors on stage in Curtaineers drama group's production of Antigone
